verses.verse: I love<WH7355> you,<WH3068> Yahweh, my strength.<WH2391>

Yahweh<WH3068> is my rock,<WH5553> my fortress,<WH4686> and my deliverer;<WH6403> my God,<WH410> my rock,<WH6697> in whom I take refuge;<WH2620> my shield,<WH4043> and the horn<WH7161> of my salvation,<WH3468> my high tower.<WH4869>
I call<WH7121> on Yahweh,<WH3068> who is worthy to be praised;<WH1984> and I am saved<WH3467> from my enemies.<WH341>
The cords<WH2256> of death<WH4194> surrounded<WH661> me.<WH5158> The floods of ungodliness<WH1100> made me afraid.<WH1204>
The cords<WH2256> of Sheol<WH7585> were around<WH5437> me.<WH4170> The snares of death<WH4194> came on me.<WH6923>

In my distress<WH6862> I called<WH7121> on Yahweh,<WH3068> and cried<WH7768> to my God.<WH430> He heard<WH8085> my voice<WH6963> out of his temple.<WH1964> My cry<WH7775> before<WH6440> him came<WH935> into his ears.<WH241>
Then the earth<WH776> shook<WH1607> and trembled.<WH7493> The foundations<WH4146> also of the mountains<WH2022> quaked<WH7264> and were shaken,<WH1607> because he was angry.<WH2734>
Smoke<WH6227> went out<WH5927> of his nostrils.<WH639> Consuming<WH398> fire<WH784> came out of his mouth.<WH6310> Coals<WH1513> were kindled by it.<WH1197>
He bowed<WH5186> the heavens<WH8064> also,<WH3381> and came down. Thick darkness<WH6205> was under his feet.<WH7272>
He rode<WH7392> on a cherub,<WH3742> and flew.<WH5774> Yes,<WH5774> he soared on the wings<WH3671> of the wind.<WH7307>
He made<WH7896> darkness<WH2822> his hiding place,<WH5643> his pavilion<WH5521> around<WH5439> him,<WH2824> darkness of waters,<WH4325> thick clouds<WH5645> of the skies.<WH5645>
At the brightness<WH5051> before him his thick clouds<WH5645> passed,<WH5674> hailstones<WH1259> and coals<WH1513> of fire.<WH784>
Yahweh<WH3068> also thundered<WH7481> in the sky.<WH8064> The Most High<WH5945> uttered<WH5414> his voice:<WH6963> hailstones<WH1259> and coals<WH1513> of fire.<WH784>
He sent out<WH7971> his arrows,<WH2671> and scattered<WH6327> them;<WH1300> Yes, great lightning bolts,<WH7232> and routed them.<WH2000>

Then the channels<WH650> of waters<WH4325> appeared.<WH7200> The foundations<WH4146> of the world<WH8398> were laid bare<WH1540> at your rebuke,<WH1606> Yahweh,<WH3068> at the blast<WH5397> of the breath<WH7307> of your nostrils.<WH639>
He sent<WH7971> from on high.<WH4791> He took<WH3947> me.<WH4871> He drew me out of many<WH7227> waters.<WH4325>
He delivered<WH5337> me from my strong<WH5794> enemy,<WH341> from those who hated<WH8130> me;<WH553> for they were too mighty for me.
They came on<WH6923> me in the day<WH3117> of my calamity,<WH343> but Yahweh<WH3068> was my support.<WH4937>
He brought me forth<WH3318> also into a large place.<WH4800> He delivered<WH2502> me,<WH2654> because he delighted in me.
Yahweh<WH3068> has rewarded<WH1580> me according to my righteousness.<WH6664> According to the cleanness<WH1252> of my hands<WH3027> has he recompensed me.<WH7725>
For I have kept<WH8104> the ways<WH1870> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and have not wickedly departed<WH7561> from my God.<WH430>
For all his ordinances<WH4941> were before me.<WH5493> I didn't put away his statutes from me.<WH2708>
I was also blameless<WH8549> with him.<WH8104> I kept myself from my iniquity.<WH5771>
Therefore Yahweh<WH3068> has rewarded<WH7725> me according to my righteousness,<WH6664> according to the cleanness<WH1252> of my hands<WH3027> in his eyesight.<WH5869>
With the merciful<WH2623> you will show yourself merciful.<WH2616> With the perfect<WH8549> man,<WH1399> you will show yourself perfect.<WH8552>
With the pure,<WH1305> you will show yourself pure.<WH1305> With the crooked<WH6141> you will show yourself shrewd.<WH6141>
For you will save<WH3467> the afflicted<WH6041> people,<WH5971> but the haughty<WH7311> eyes<WH5869> you will bring down.<WH8213>
For you will light<WH215> my lamp,<WH5216> Yahweh.<WH3068> My God<WH430> will light<WH5050> up my darkness.<WH2822>
For by you,<WH7323> I advance through a troop.<WH1416> By my God,<WH430> I leap over<WH1801> a wall.<WH7791>
As for God,<WH410> his way<WH1870> is perfect.<WH8549> The word<WH565> of Yahweh<WH3068> is tried.<WH6884> He is a shield<WH4043> to all those who take refuge in him.<WH2620>
For who is God,<WH433> except<WH1107> Yahweh?<WH3068> Who is a rock,<WH6697> besides<WH2108> our God,<WH430>
the God<WH410> who arms<WH247> me with strength,<WH2428> and makes<WH5414> my way<WH1870> perfect?<WH8549>
He makes<WH7737> my feet<WH7272> like deer<WH355>'s feet,<WH5975> and sets me on my high places.<WH1116>
He teaches<WH3925> my hands<WH3027> to war,<WH4421> so that my arms<WH2220> bend<WH5181> a bow<WH7198> of bronze.<WH5154>
You have also given<WH5414> me the shield<WH4043> of your salvation.<WH3468> Your right hand<WH3225> sustains<WH5582> me.<WH6037> Your gentleness has made me great.<WH7235>
You have enlarged<WH7337> my steps<WH6806> under me,<WH7166> My feet have not slipped.<WH4571>
I will pursue<WH7291> my enemies,<WH341> and overtake<WH5381> them.<WH7725> Neither will I turn again until they are consumed.<WH3615>
I will strike<WH4272> them through,<WH3201> so that they will not be able to rise.<WH6965> They shall fall<WH5307> under my feet.<WH7272>
For you have armed<WH247> me with strength<WH2428> to the battle.<WH4421> You have subdued<WH3766> under me those who rose up against me.<WH6965>
You have also made<WH5414> my enemies<WH341> turn their backs<WH6203> to me,<WH6789> that I might cut off those who hate me.<WH8130>
They cried,<WH7768> but there was none to save;<WH3467> even to Yahweh,<WH3068> but he didn't<WH6030> answer them.
Then I beat<WH7833> them small as the dust<WH6083> before<WH6440> the wind.<WH7307> I cast them out<WH7324> as the mire<WH2916> of the streets.<WH2351>

You have delivered<WH6403> me from the strivings<WH7379> of the people.<WH5971> You have made<WH7760> me the head<WH7218> of the nations.<WH1471> A people<WH5971> whom I have not known<WH3045> shall serve me.<WH5647>
As soon as they hear<WH8088> of me they shall obey<WH8085> me.<WH1121> The foreigners shall submit themselves to me.<WH3584>
The foreigners<WH1121> shall fade away,<WH5034> and shall come trembling<WH2727> out of their close places.<WH4526>
Yahweh<WH3068> lives;<WH2416> and blessed<WH1288> be my rock.<WH6697> Exalted<WH7311> be the God<WH430> of my salvation,<WH3468>
even the God<WH410> who executes vengeance<WH5414> for me,<WH1696> and subdues peoples under me.<WH5971>
He rescues<WH6403> me from my enemies.<WH341> Yes,<WH7311> you lift me up above those who rise up<WH7311> against me.<WH5337> You deliver me from the violent<WH2555> man.<WH376>
Therefore I will give thanks<WH3034> to you,<WH3068> Yahweh, among the nations,<WH1471> and will sing praises<WH2167> to your name.<WH8034>

He gives great<WH1431> deliverance<WH3444> to his king,<WH4428> and shows<WH6213> loving kindness<WH2617> to his anointed,<WH4899> to David<WH1732> and to his seed,<WH2233> <WH5704> forevermore.<WH5769>
